text:
Liam Hemsworth (born 13 January 1990) is an Australian actor. He first became known on Australian television for his roles in "Neighbours" and "The Elephant Princess". He is perhaps best known for his role as Gale Hawthorne in "The Hunger Games" movie series (2012–15). He also has starred in movies such as "The Last Song" (2010), "The Expendables 2" (2012), "Paranoia" (2013), "Empire State" (2013) and ' (2016).
Hemsworth's older brothers, Luke and Chris, are also actors.
Hemsworth was born in Melbourne, Victoria. He grew up on Phillip Island, Victoria. He married American singer and actress Miley Cyrus in December 2018. The couple's divorce was finalised in January 2020. He is vegan.
